title: PLZ HELP!!!! "An unexpected error occurred while logging in"
body:
An unexpected error occurred while logging in. I think this problem is caused by my router. I bought my router about 2 months ago and that worked very well until today. Last night I played 10 lol games and this morning I just cannot log in. I tried to connect my computer directly to the modem and that worked. I just cannot log in from my router. Since I think this is the router problem,  I reset my router for 3 times after that but still all failed.

btw, my router is Linksys WRT 1900ACS with Firmware version: 2.0.1.177097

replies.body:
It does sound like your network is having trouble reaching our services, perhaps some update with your OS or software is causing a block.  My suggestino would be to run through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this.

You can also download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to help auto-configure firewall settings.  Let me know if those steps helps!
btw, my router is Linksys WRT 1900ACS with Firmware version: 2.0.1.177097
